data.title: A Site to A Belt ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to use early in the round to suppress enemies pushing A Belt.

data.title: A Screens to A Pipes ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to get info on enemies pushing toward A Site.

data.title: B Green to B Garage ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to get info and suppress enemies pushing toward B Green.

data.title: B Site to B Yellow ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to prevent enemies from pushing up and gauging how close the enemies are.

data.title: A Site to A Nest FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: This is a good FLASH/DRIVE to peek A Nest from A Site or to delay a push and re-position.

data.title: A Screens to A Pipes FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT to delay a push into A Site from A Screens.

data.title: A Site to A Belt ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Belt from A Site to suppress your opponents.

data.title: A Site to A Nest ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Nest from A Site to suppress your opponents.

data.title: B Snowman to B Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for B Default post plant from B Snowman and is also useful to stop a planter.

data.title: A Screens to A Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Default from A Screens.

data.title: B Site to B Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for B Site to stop a plant.

data.title: Mid Boiler to B Green ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for B Green
